channel.title: Kerbrute on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Kerbrute on TLDRBins

item.title: Kerberos
item.description: Users enum kerbrute kerbrute userenum --domain <DOMAIN> --dc <DC> <USERNAMES_FILE> Ref: kerbrute Usernames generator username-anarchy ./username-anarchy -i <USERS_FILE> | tee <USERNAMES_FILE> Ref: username-anarchy Generate Kerberos ticket (From Linux) Impacket Kinit # Auth with password sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' # Auth with hash sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT -hashes :<HASH> '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' export KRB5CCNAME=<USER>.ccache # Check ticket klist # Step 0: Installation sudo apt install krb5-user cifs-utils # Step 1: Add domain controller to '/etc/hosts' (Try different order if not work) <TARGET> <DC> <DOMAIN> # Step 2: Add domain controller as a DNS server to '/etc/resolv.
